name: Floating Social Share Bar (Lizard)
author: shivashankerbhatta, RiteshShakya

sections.description:
Floating Social Share Bar (Lizard) – is the social sharing plugin with topmost social media link.

Contribution link: https://github.com/shshanker/floating-social-share-bar-lizard

The Plugin Features:

  • Shape – Changable shapes, rectangle or round. (New)

  • Show/hide floating menu – Now you have option to choose if you want to disable floating menu or not. (New)

  • Show/hide in content – Now you have option to choose if you want to palce it into the content. (New)

  • Lizard – The plugin has an ability to change its background color bar based on the type of social share icon displayed.

  • Floating – Enables floating social share options on fixed left/right side of your site.

  • Position – You can simply set the position of the share icon (right to left). Top position of the plugin has been calculated based on number of social share icon displayed.

  • Full Responsive – Tested on mobile browsers.

License

GPLv2 or later
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

sections.installation:
• Download to your plugin directory or simply install via WordPress admin interface.
  • Activate.
  • Goto Setting admin menu, right on the button you’ll find “Floating Social Share”.
  • Set and update as per you requirement.
  • Float.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0 – 04/07/16

  • Feature – Introduced url based total shares counter. It only shows the number of shares of the social platform which facilitate/return total counts of specific url.

short_description: Social Share Opyions ( Floating and in content) | Topmost social media link | Ability to change its background-color-bar.
